name: QueryPie
long_description:
QueryPie solves two major enterprise challenges:
meeting ITGC audit and compliance requirements, and protecting sensitive data from internal misuse and external threats — while offering insight into data usage for AI.

By centralizing access control and audit across databases, servers, and containers in both on-prem and cloud, QueryPie simplifies security and compliance in one platform.

Now, with MCP-powered AI Agent, QueryPie expands beyond access control into a fully autonomous assistant that:
	•	📊 Transforms SQL into natural conversations
	•	🛠️ Automates infra operations
	•	🧠 Detects threats via AI-driven behavior analytics

More than just a security tool, QueryPie empowers secure, AI-native enterprise operations.
one_liner: The Autonomous AI Assistant for Data Analytics, Infra Operations &…
